DOC.detailed_description: An initial pre-anesthetic evaluation physical examination perform attending anesthesiologist , eye exam perform attend ophthalmologist determine suitability inclusion accord criterion . Ideally eye exam take place immediately prior conduction study . However , logistical restraint may require eye exam take place separate time/date prior conduction study . IOPs measure attend ophthalmologist ( B.E . ) blind actual reading Tonopen mean small screen , single train observer ( E.F. ) record observation Tonopen . The nitrous oxide sedation manage attend anesthesiologist ( K.L. ) . All patient monitor throughout use standardized monitoring ( continuous EKG , non-invasive BP , continuous pulse oximetry ) .
